root.name: Replika
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by the Portuguese folks at Biodroid, Replika is being announced as a third-person action/strategy hybrid with a lot of cyberpunk influences, some puzzle solving and a female cyborg as the main character. The title is being developed as a downloadable game for the PSN and it is said to feature full 3D stereoscopic support. Replika will be a single-player only game. StoryNot much is known at this point (March 2011), but one of the developers gave an interview in which he said You can expect a very dense storyline with allusions to military, psychological and religious concepts. It’s more mature than what players are used to in a game and it deals with very deep and philosophical questions. Other MediumsThe movie rights for Replika have been officially acquired and as such, a potential film is to be expected at some point in the future.Links Official Website Development Diary
